content: On that day Jesus had gone out of the house and was sitting by the sea.
And large crowds gathered to Him, so He got into a boat and sat down, and the whole crowd was standing on the beach.

Then He left the crowds and went into the house. And His disciples came to Him and said, “Explain to us the parable of the weeds of the field.”
When Jesus had finished these parables, He departed from there.
And He came to His hometown and  teaching them in their synagogue, with the result that they were astonished, and said, “Where  this man  this wisdom and  miraculous powers?
Is this not the carpenter’s son? Is His mother not called Mary, and His brothers, James, Joseph, Simon, and Judas?
And His sisters, are they not all with us? Where then  this man  all these things?”
